posts.post_content:
I've used this for a while with [Reya Dawnbringer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Reya Dawnbringer). It creates a cool combo with [corpse connoisseur](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=corpse connoisseur) and [hell's caretaker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=hell's caretaker) in which I animate the caretaker with reya then, next turn, reya brings back the connoisseur who entombs a creature and then caretaker sacs the connoiseur to animate the entombed creature. I use [Empyrial Archangel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Empyrial Archangel ) (goes great with Reya, making me very hard to damage, seeing as even if you kill the Archangel, Reya can bring her back), [angel of despair](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=angel of despair ) (If she's in my graveyard with hell's caretaker and Reya in play, I can bring her in with Reya and then sac her to the caretaker to bring her back with the caretaker, thus vindicating two permanents) and I'm about to try [realm razer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=realm razer ) to repeatedly exile any lands as a smash with Reya.
  
   
... too bad entomb got unbanned and Iona was printed, making all my progress feel obsolete. Oh well, I still have ... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

Posted By: Qazior (7/30/2009 1:51:56 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Demigod's ability won't work unless you cast it from your graveyard with something like [Yawgmoth's Will](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Yawgmoth's Will), so burying 3 of them and trying to [reanimate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=reanimate) probably wouldn't be that great an idea. I mean yeah, it's a 5/4 flying, hasting beater, but there are better reanimator targets in my opinion.
posts.html:
Demigod's ability won't work unless you cast it from your graveyard with something like Yawgmoth's Will, so burying 3 of them and trying to reanimate probably wouldn't be that great an idea. I mean yeah, it's a 5/4 flying, hasting beater, but there are better reanimator targets in my opinion.
